h2_title: Yellow Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: Usually as you begin your second combo chain, he'll do one of two things. If he performs a spinning flip, he'll retreat backwards, but the end of your combo can usually chase after him and strike regardless.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Usually as you begin your second combo chain, he'll do one of two things. If he performs a spinning flip, he'll retreat backwards, but the end of your combo can usually chase after him and strike regardless.
